id.description: A device identifier. Should be obtained by a platform-specific device API.

vars.description: Extra information that will be bundled in the session token.

AccountDevice.description: Send a device to the server. Used with authenticate/link/unlink and user.

AccountExport.description: An export of all information stored for a user account.

ApiEndpointDescriptor.title: API Explorer List of Endpoints response message

AuthenticateLogoutRequest.description: Log out a session and invalidate a session token.

CallApiEndpointResponse.title: API Explorer response definition for CallApiEndpoint

channel_id.description: The channel this message belongs to.

message_id.description: The unique ID of this message.

code.description: The code representing a message type or category.

sender_id.description: Message sender, usually a user ID.

username.description: The username of the message sender, if any.

create_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the message was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the message was last updated.

persistent.description: True if the message was persisted to the channel's history, false otherwise.

room_name.description: The name of the chat room, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a chat room.

group_id.description: The ID of the group, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a group channel.

user_id_one.description: The ID of the first DM user, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a DM chat.

user_id_two.description: The ID of the second DM user, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a DM chat.

ChannelMessage.description: A message sent on a channel.

next_cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the next page, if any.

prev_cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the previous page, if any.

cacheable_cursor.description: Cacheable cursor to list newer messages. Durable and designed to be stored, unlike next/prev cursors.

ChannelMessageList.description: A list of channel messages, usually a result of a list operation.

warnings.description: Any warnings about the current config.

Config.description: The current server configuration and any associated warnings.

token.description: A session token (JWT) for the console user.

mfa_code.description: MFA code required to setup the MFA mechanism.

update_time.description: Time of the latest relationship update.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next page of results, if any.

FriendList.description: A collection of zero or more friends of the user.

creator_id.description: The id of the user who created the group.

name.description: The unique name of the group.

lang_tag.description: The language expected to be a tag which follows the BCP-47 spec.

metadata.description: Additional information stored as a JSON object.

avatar_url.description: A URL for an avatar image.

open.description: Anyone can join open groups, otherwise only admins can accept members.

edge_count.description: The current count of all members in the group.

max_count.description: The maximum number of members allowed.

create_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the group was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the group was last updated.

GroupExport.description: An export of all information stored for a group.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next page of results, if any.

GroupUserList.description: A list of users belonging to a group, along with their role.

leaderboard_id.description: The ID of the leaderboard this score belongs to.

owner_id.description: The ID of the score owner, usually a user or group.

username.description: The username of the score owner, if the owner is a user.

num_score.description: The number of submissions to this score record.

create_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the leaderboard record was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the leaderboard record was updated.

expiry_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the leaderboard record expires.

max_num_score.description: The maximum number of score updates allowed by the owner.

LeaderboardRecord.description: Represents a complete leaderboard record with all scores and associated metadata.

owner_records.description: A batched set of leaderboard records belonging to specified owners.

next_cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the next page, if any.

prev_cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the previous page, if any.

rank_count.description: The total number of ranks available.

LeaderboardRecordList.description: A set of leaderboard records, may be part of a leaderboard records page or a batch of individual records.

cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the next page, if any.

prev_cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the previous page, if any.

PurchaseList.description: A list of validated purchases stored by Nakama.

nodes.description: List of nodes and their stats.

StatusList.description: List of nodes and their stats.

match_count.description: Current number of active authoritative matches.

avg_rate_sec.description: Average number of requests per second.

StatusList.Status.description: The status of a Nakama node.

collections.title: Available collection names in the whole of the storage

objects.description: List of storage objects matching list/filter operation.

total_count.description: Approximate total number of storage objects.

collection.description: The collection which stores the object.

key.description: The key of the object within the collection.

user_id.description: The user owner of the object.

version.description: The version hash of the object.

permission_read.description: The read access permissions for the object.

permission_write.description: The write access permissions for the object.

create_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the object was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the object was last updated.

StorageListObject.description: An object within the storage engine.

collection.description: The collection which stores the object.

key.description: The key of the object within the collection.

user_id.description: The user owner of the object.

version.description: The version hash of the object.

permission_read.description: The read access permissions for the object.

permission_write.description: The write access permissions for the object.

create_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the object was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the object was last updated.

StorageObject.description: An object within the storage engine.

collection.description: The collection which stores the object.

key.description: The key of the object within the collection.

version.description: The version hash of the object.

create_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the object was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the object was last updated.

StoreEnvironment.description:
- UNKNOWN: Unknown environment.
 - SANDBOX: Sandbox/test environment.
 - PRODUCTION: Production environment.
StoreEnvironment.title: Environment where a purchase/subscription took place,

StoreProvider.description:
- APPLE_APP_STORE: Apple App Store
 - GOOGLE_PLAY_STORE: Google Play Store
 - HUAWEI_APP_GALLERY: Huawei App Gallery
 - FACEBOOK_INSTANT_STORE: Facebook Instant Store
StoreProvider.title: Validation Provider,

cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the next page, if any.

prev_cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the previous page, if any.

SubscriptionList.description: A list of validated subscriptions stored by Nakama.

state.description: The user's relationship to the group.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next page of results, if any.

UserGroupList.description: A list of groups belonging to a user, along with the user's role in each group.

mfa_required.description: Whether the user is required to setup MFA.

mfa_enabled.description: Whether the user has MFA enabled.

user_id.description: The user this presence belongs to.

session_id.description: A unique session ID identifying the particular connection, because the user may have many.

persistence.description: Whether this presence generates persistent data/messages, if applicable for the stream type.

status.description: A user-set status message for this stream, if applicable.

UserPresence.description: A user session associated to a stream, usually through a list operation or a join/leave event.

UserRole.title:
- USER_ROLE_ADMIN: All access
 - USER_ROLE_DEVELOPER: Best for developers, also enables APIs and API explorer
 - USER_ROLE_MAINTAINER: Best for users who regularly update player information.
 - USER_ROLE_READONLY: Read-only role for those only need to view data

purchase_time.description: Timestamp when the purchase was done.

create_time.description: Timestamp when the receipt validation was stored in DB.

update_time.description: Timestamp when the receipt validation was updated in DB.

refund_time.title: Timestamp when the purchase was refunded. Set to UNIX

environment.description: Whether the purchase was done in production or sandbox environment.

seen_before.description: Whether the purchase had already been validated by Nakama before.

original_transaction_id.description: Purchase Original transaction ID (we only keep track of the original subscription, not subsequent renewals).

purchase_time.description: UNIX Timestamp when the purchase was done.

create_time.description: UNIX Timestamp when the receipt validation was stored in DB.

update_time.description: UNIX Timestamp when the receipt validation was updated in DB.

environment.description: Whether the purchase was done in production or sandbox environment.

expiry_time.description: Subscription expiration time. The subscription can still be auto-renewed to extend the expiration time further.

refund_time.description: Subscription refund time. If this time is set, the subscription was refunded.

active.description: Whether the subscription is currently active or not.

id.description: The identifier of this wallet change.

user_id.description: The user ID this wallet ledger item belongs to.

create_time.description: The UNIX time when the wallet ledger item was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time when the wallet ledger item was updated.

WalletLedger.description: An individual update to a user's wallet.

items.description: A list of wallet ledger items.

next_cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the next older page, if any.

prev_cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the previous page newer, if any.

WalletLedgerList.description: List of wallet ledger items for a particular user.

field.description: The config field this warning is for in a JSON pointer format.

Warning.description: A warning for a configuration field.

email.description: The email address of the user.

devices.description: The devices which belong to the user's account.

custom_id.description: The custom id in the user's account.

verify_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the user's email was verified.

disable_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the user's account was disabled/banned.

api.Account.description: A user with additional account details. Always the current user.

match_id.description: The ID of the match, can be used to join.

authoritative.description: True if it's an server-managed authoritative match, false otherwise.

size.description: Current number of users in the match.

content.description: Content of the notification in JSON.

sender_id.description: ID of the sender, if a user. Otherwise 'null'.

create_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the notification was created.

persistent.description: True if this notification was persisted to the database.

id.description: The id of the user's account.

username.description: The username of the user's account.

display_name.description: The display name of the user.

avatar_url.description: A URL for an avatar image.

lang_tag.description: The language expected to be a tag which follows the BCP-47 spec.

location.description: The location set by the user.

timezone.description: The timezone set by the user.

metadata.description: Additional information stored as a JSON object.

facebook_id.description: The Facebook id in the user's account.

google_id.description: The Google id in the user's account.

gamecenter_id.description: The Apple Game Center in of the user's account.

steam_id.description: The Steam id in the user's account.

online.description: Indicates whether the user is currently online.

edge_count.description: Number of related edges to this user.

create_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the user was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the user was last updated.

facebook_instant_game_id.description: The Facebook Instant Game ID in the user's account.

apple_id.description: The Apple Sign In ID in the user's account.

disable_time.description: The UNIX time when the account was disabled.

description.description: The description of the leaderboard. May be blank.

category.description: The category of the leaderboard. e.g. "vip" could be category 1.

sort_order.description: ASC or DESC sort mode of scores in the leaderboard.

size.description: The current number of players in the leaderboard.

max_size.description: The maximum number of players for the leaderboard.

max_num_score.description: The maximum score updates allowed per player for the current leaderboard.

end_active.description: The UNIX time when the leaderboard stops being active until next reset. A computed value.

metadata.description: Additional information stored as a JSON object.

create_time.description: The UNIX time when the leaderboard was created.

start_time.description: The UNIX time when the leaderboard will start.

end_time.description: The UNIX time when the leaderboard will be stopped.

duration.description: Duration of the tournament in seconds.

start_active.description: The UNIX time when the leaderboard start being active. A computed value.

prev_reset.description: The UNIX time when the tournament was last reset. A computed value.

next_reset.description: The UNIX time when the tournament is next playable. A computed value.

total.description: Total count of leaderboards and tournaments.

console.MatchList.description: A list of realtime matches, with their node names.

content.description: Content of the notification in JSON.

sender_id.description: ID of the sender, if a user. Otherwise 'null'.

create_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the notification was created.

persistent.description: True if this notification was persisted to the database.
